# Webhooks

Kirby Pay has many webhooks to hear for every service, for connect it, you need to know which URL you need to set, and for that reason is the env option. Set the env to test or local to enable the development option in the panel:

return [
    'beebmx.kirby-pay.env' => 'local'
];

Now you can see the development mode and check the Webhook URL.
